title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 1207.1 - Purpose
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 1207.1 - Purpose

State Regulations

This Part establishes procedures through which local
governments may apply for and receive moneys for reimbursement for training
costs associated with administration and enforcement of the New York State

Uniform Fire Prevention and Building Code (Uniform Code). Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 19
ยง
1207.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
